analysis.key_quote: This current administration was voted in to stop corruption and trump himself has said he fights corruption, which is why there should be a law made to ban anyone with a networth over $1M from having federal office or if they know or are employed by a rich person.
analysis.rationale: The comment does not directly address the proposed rule regarding Schedule F or civil service protections, focusing instead on broader political issues and corruption, which makes it unclear in relation to the specific topic.
